title: Ping and Disconnection
body: On my laptop on run about 41 pings constantly but ever since I downloaded Office 365 its been constantly at 58 ping (with lag spikes) and I always randomly disconnect. Is Office 365 the problem or is it something else? Help please.

replies.body: Downloading Office might be a coincidence, but I haven't used it and can't say for sure.  There may be other issues with your network like packet loss, or maybe even a change in the routing your ISP takes to reach our server.  I suggest running a [log reader](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743-Connection-Troubleshooting-Log-Reader) to get an overview what what's happening exactly.  You'll also get a set of instructions specific to your case to get this fixed up.  Hope that helps!
